chat_history.message:
Hello, My product iPhone 13 mini has the above problem: All inputs are very dirty. Both speakers on the front and bottom speakers as well as the charging port
Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

We have carried out a commercial gesture of €80 on your behalf to the customer. 

Indeed, according to our quality charter, the customer is entitled to this type of compensation because of grade issue.

Thank you for your understanding.

Best Regards,
Astrid of Back Market

Dear Backcare,

This is not a grade issue as the appearance of the device is not altered and can be resolved. 

Could you please request the customer to try to brush the device with a toothbrush and alcohol to resolve the issue in hopes to resolve the issue on their end?

Please let us know if the issue persists.

Regards,
JH
